findings.title: Repeated available() Calculation Avoidance in Staking
findings.description: The unstaking logic makes repeated calculation of `available` staked amount to withdraw for a given account and suggests caching the first result and reusing it instead of making a repeated calculation.

findings.title: Revisited Staking Duration Update Logic in Staking
findings.description: The `Staking` contract supports dynamic change of staking duration but can be improved by introducing a new storage state to record intended new staking duration ahead, instead of providing it at the moment when it is actually used.

findings.title: Improved Order Validation Logic in Swap/SwapERC20
findings.description: The helper routine `check()` can be improved by adjusting the `nonceUsed` check and the `signatoryMinimumNonce` validation as part of the `else` branch.
